hero_section_description: The power of self-driving cars in the palm of your hand. BIA RADAR uses technology to filter the world and deliver only what matters
objective_description: Walking shouldn't be an act of courage. BIA RADAR fills the gap that the traditional cane doesn't reach, returning fluidity to movement
objective_item_1_description: While you map the ground, BIA takes care of what's above, where 40% of cane users experience collisions every month
objective_item_2_description: Don't wait for the touch to know there's danger. We eliminate the 100% 'detection gap' that regular canes have for elevated obstacles
objective_item_3_description: Our AI filters out the chaos of the city and reduces unnecessary alerts by over 70%, leaving your mind free to enjoy the path
objective_item_4_description: Gain reaction time with a system that responds in 30ms, without relying on internet or cell signal to protect you
objective_image_alt: 3D rendering of the BIA Radar attached to a traditional white cane.
expandible_platform_title: Inclusive by design, modular by necessity
expandible_platform_description: We believe you shouldn't have to adapt to the device, but the other way around. Our modular platform allows BIA to evolve with your needs, whether you're an urban explorer or someone seeking discreet support for everyday life. It's invisible technology that becomes indispensable
join_the_waiting_list_to_not_miss_anythi: Join the waiting list to not miss anything
humanization_description: In a world of subscriptions and surveillance, we choose the path of ethics. BIA-RADAR is designed to serve you, not to collect your data or create financial dependencies
humanization_item_1_description: You purchase the product and it's yours. Period. No 'subscription for life' model because we believe autonomy should not have an expiration date
humanization_item_2_description: All AI processing is done locally on the device. Your location and your paths never leave your hands and never touch the cloud
humanization_item_3_title: IMPACTFUL AI, NOT JUST A BUZZWORD
humanization_item_3_description: Our AI is a tool for real impact, not a marketing gimmick. It filters what's relevant to you, reducing unnecessary alerts and ensuring that the technology serves your experience, not the other way around
audio_engine_description: With fully dubbed menus and the "Ok BIA" command for immediate location, the device respects your autonomy. No complex apps, no cloud, no latency
preview_description: This site is currently under construction. Please enter the access code
recognition_description: Born from a national innovation competition to solve a real problem. Recognized and awarded by ABDI and HubTec, BIA-RADAR is Brazilian technology designed to restore what matters most: dignity
recognition_quote: We create new senses to restore autonomy and dignity
roadmap_price_note: Retail price will be announced soon, join the <u>waiting list</u> to not miss anything
